# Introduction

`ryx` is a statistical package, that conducts correlation tests between two 
variables of a given dataset. 

# Installation

First, install the `ryx` package:

```{r}
install.packages("ryx")
library(ryx)
```

# Finding Correlations

```{r}
# Load dataset
data(mtcars)

# Perform correlation tests
results <- ryx(mtcars, y = "mpg", x = c("disp", "hp", "wt"))

# Display results
print(results)
plot(results)
summary(results)
```

# Conclusion

This vignette demonstrated the basic usage of the ryx package for conducting 
correlation tests between variables.
